text:
Happy Monday! I had a blast talking with Justin Simon (I need to recruit him to join) of TechSmith about repurposing content, getting stakeholders involved, and personalizing your content for your audience.

You can follow the link or find The 3C Podcast (Curating Content Creators) wherever you listen to fine audio content.  :headphones::beverage_box: <https://www.thejuicehq.com/blog/new-3c-podcast-episode-creating-content-and-unifying-the-plan-with-justin-simon-of-techsmith>

attachments.title: New 3C Podcast Episode: Creating Content and Unifying the Plan with Justin Simon of TechSmith| The Juice
attachments.text: We are on a mission to provide value to B2B content marketers abound. Rewind the VHS version of your content strategy. Let us help you deliver the Netflix experience.
attachments.fallback: New 3C Podcast Episode: Creating Content and Unifying the Plan with Justin Simon of TechSmith| The Juice
